itineraries.title: Egypt's Timeless Journey: Giza, Luxor, Aswan & Nile Cruise

visits.text: Discovery of Cairo with the Cairo Tower offering a panoramic view of the city and the Nile.
Stroll through the Zamalek district, its colonial villas, art galleries and cafés by the river.

activities.text: Visit to the Egyptian Museum, famous for Tutankhamun's mask and pharaonic treasures.
Walk and relaxation at Al-Azhar Park with view of the Mohamed Ali Mosque.

visits.text: Exploration of the Giza plateau: the Great Pyramid of Khufu, the pyramids of Khafre and Menkaure.
Discovery of the Sphinx, millennial guardian of the funerary complex.

activities.text: Guided tour with an Egyptologist and camel ride in the surrounding desert.
Sunset over the pyramids from a panoramic viewpoint.

visits.text: Flight Cairo - Luxor (1h). Check-in on the east bank of the Nile.
Visit of the Luxor temple illuminated at nightfall.

activities.text: Discovery of the Karnak temple and its monumental columns at opening.
Free walk along the Nile corniche.

visits.text: Excursion to the Valley of the Kings, exploration of pharaonic tombs.
Visit of Queen Hatshepsut's temple, built against the cliff.

activities.text: Observation at sunrise of hot air balloons above Luxor.
Discovery of the Colossi of Memnon.

visits.text: Train or car to Aswan (3-4h).
Visit to the Temple of Philae, moved to an island to escape rising waters.

activities.text: Felucca ride on the Nile at sunset.
Discovery of the unfinished obelisk and the viewpoint over the Aswan Dam.

visits.text: Morning excursion to Abu Simbel (3h drive each way).
Visit to the monumental temples of Ramesses II and Nefertari, carved into the rock.

activities.text: Return to Aswan in the afternoon, free time by the Nile.

visits.text: Visit to the Aswan Botanical Garden on Kitchener Island.
Walk through a colorful Nubian village and discovery of local culture.

activities.text: Relaxing cruise on the Nile before the return flight to Cairo.

seo.h1_title: Egypt's Timeless Journey: Giza, Luxor, Aswan & Nile Cruise
seo.intro_paragraph: Cairo and its pyramids, Luxor the ancient Thebes, Aswan and its feluccas on the Nile. Discover five millennia of history in one journey.
seo.seo_hook: Pyramid stones glow eternal, temple hieroglyphs gleam with aged gold, Nile waters flow sacred and ancient. Classic Egypt is timeless.

itineraries.title: Egypt Classic Tour: Nile River Temples and Red Sea Resort Escape

Discovery of the Coptic quarter and the Hanging Church

activities.text: Free evening in downtown Cairo

visits.text: Guided tour of the Giza plateau: pyramids of Khufu, Khafre, Menkaure and Sphinx
Discovery of the Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM) presenting the treasures of Tutankhamun

activities.text: Sound and light show at the pyramids of Giza

visits.text: Domestic flight Cairo → Luxor, hotel check-in
Hot air balloon flight over the Valley of the Kings
Visit to Queen Hatshepsut's temple
Visit to the temple of Luxor

activities.text: Stroll through the Luxor souk
Sound and light show at Karnak temple
Boarding the Nile cruise
Observation of the Nile banks from the boat's deck

visits.text: Navigation to Edfu with a stop at Esna
Visit to the temple of Horus at Edfu

activities.text: Navigation to Aswan at the end of the day

visits.text: Stop at Kom Ombo to visit the temple of Sobek and Horus
Excursion to the temple of Philae on Agilkia island
Visit to the High Dam of Aswan
Excursion to Abu Simbel (temples of Ramesses II and Nefertari)
Flight Aswan → Sharm El-Sheikh then transfer to Dahab

activities.text: Relaxation and stroll on the Nile by felucca
Return to Aswan and end of the Nile cruise
Check-in and swimming in the Red Sea

visits.text: Scuba diving at Blue Hole with a certified local center
Exploration of the coral reef and relaxation on the beach
4x4 excursion in the Sinai desert and colored canyon
Transfer to Sharm El Sheikh, free time

activities.text: Evening by the sea
Sunset over the desert
Last swim in the sea and relaxation before departure
Sunset over the desert

visits.text: Transfer to Sharm El Sheikh, free time

activities.text: Last swim in the sea and relaxation before departure

seo.h1_title: Egypt Classic Tour: Nile River Temples and Red Sea Resort Escape
seo.intro_paragraph: Cairo and Giza, Luxor, Edfu, Aswan, then relaxation on Dahab or Sharm el-Sheikh beaches and reefs. The classic Egypt itinerary.
seo.seo_hook: Pyramids pierce the sky, temples crown the hills, coral reefs glitter, desert sands glow golden. Egypt is eternal magic.

itineraries.title: Egypt Complete Itinerary: Ancient Temples, Nile Cruise & Red Sea Coral Reefs

visits.text: Discovery of downtown Cairo: Tahrir Square, Egyptian Museum and Nile walk
Exploration of the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx
Visit to Khan el-Khalili market and Al-Azhar mosque

activities.text: Walking tour in Zamalek district and café by the Nile
Break at a traditional café for mint tea and hookah

visits.text: Night train Cairo – Aswan (sleeper cabin, 12-hour journey)
Excursion to Abu Simbel temple at sunrise
Return to Aswan and visit to the Nubian village

activities.text: Check-in at Aswan and walk along the Nile banks
Felucca cruise on the Nile at sunset
Walk in the souk of Luxor and observation of local life

visits.text: Journey Aswan – Luxor by train
Discovery of the temple of Karnak
Excursion on the west bank: Valley of the Kings and temple of Hatshepsut

activities.text: Crossing the Nile by local boat
Snorkeling in the bay of Marsa Shagra

visits.text: Marsa Alam (5h30 drive)
Observation of dolphins and turtles on the reef of Marsa Shagra

activities.text: Relaxation on the beach and sunset over the Red Sea
Last moments of relaxation facing the Red Sea

visits.text: Journey Dahab – Taba (4h)
Seaside walk in Taba before the Israeli border

activities.text: Check-in at Dahab and walk along the waterfront

visits.text: Transfer to Sharm El Sheikh
Exploration of diving spots Blue Hole and Canyon

activities.text: Snorkeling or relaxation on Dahab beach
Walk in downtown Dahab and dinner on the beach
Walk in downtown Dahab and dinner on the beach

seo.h1_title: Egypt Complete Itinerary: Ancient Temples, Nile Cruise & Red Sea Coral Reefs
seo.intro_paragraph: Cairo and the pyramids, Luxor and its temples, peaceful Aswan, Red Sea reefs at Dahab and Marsa Alam. Egypt is a living museum.
seo.seo_hook: Temple stones stand eternal, Nile waters flow as they always have, coral reefs dazzle, desert winds whisper. Egypt is timeless.

itineraries.title: Journey Down the Nile: Cairo, Luxor & Ancient Temple Passage

visits.text: Free discovery of Cairo's city center, the Islamic quarter and the El Ataba markets

activities.text: Dinner cruise on the Nile with traditional music and view of the illuminated city

visits.text: Discovery of the Giza Pyramids complex: Khufu, Khafre and Menkaure
Visit of the Sphinx and its associated temple
Exploration of the Saqqara necropolis and Djoser's step pyramid

activities.text: Guided visit with an Egyptologist to understand the funerary rituals of the Old Kingdom
Private vehicle journey from Aswan to Luxor with cultural stops

visits.text: Visit of the Temple of Kom Ombo dedicated to Sobek and Horus
Discovery of the Temple of Edfu, consecrated to the falcon god Horus
Discovery of the Temple of Karnak, immense religious complex dedicated to Amun-Ra
Walk on the Avenue of Sphinxes connecting Karnak to Luxor Temple
Visit of Luxor Temple illuminated at sunset
Exploration of the Valley of the Kings and visit of several pharaonic tombs
Visit of Hatshepsut's mortuary temple, backed against the cliffs of Deir el-Bahari
Discovery of the Colossi of Memnon

activities.text: Sound and light show observation at Karnak Temple
Hot air balloon flight at sunrise above the Valley of the Kings
Boat trip to Philae Island and sunset observation over the Nile

visits.text: Visit of Philae Temple on Agilkia Island, dedicated to Isis, Osiris and Horus
Discovery of the Unfinished Obelisk in the granite quarries of Aswan
Excursion to the temples of Abu Simbel, masterpiece of Ramses II and Nefertari

activities.text: Morning journey Aswan → Abu Simbel (280 km, 4h) and return in late afternoon
Evening and night aboard a felucca, meals and Nubian songs by the fire

visits.text: Traditional felucca sailing on the Nile from Aswan
Continuation of felucca sailing with stops in Nubian villages

activities.text: Swimming in the Nile and discovery of local Nubian culture
Swimming in the Nile and discovery of local Nubian culture

seo.h1_title: Journey Down the Nile: Cairo, Luxor & Ancient Temple Passage
seo.intro_paragraph: From Cairo to Aswan, sail the Nile by felucca or cruise. The river that saw the pharaohs born guides you from temple to temple.
seo.seo_hook: Temples stand eternal, the Nile flows on its ancient course, feluccas drift gently, desert glows golden. Cairo to Luxor is a sacred, timeless journey.

itineraries.title: Egypt Beyond the Pyramids: A Journey to Temples & Desert Oases

visits.text: Arrival in Luxor and discovery of the Temple of Luxor illuminated in the evening

activities.text: Hotel check-in and free walk along the Nile corniche

visits.text: Visit to Karnak temple, the largest religious complex of ancient Egypt
Discovery of the temple of Horus at Edfu, perfectly preserved since the Ptolemaic period

activities.text: Minibus journey to Edfu
Boarding the traditional sandal and first navigation on the Nile

visits.text: Exploration of the temple of Sobek and Haroeris at Kom Ombo, dedicated to the crocodile god

activities.text: Peaceful cruise on the Nile, observation of Nubian villages and cultures

visits.text: Visit to Philae temple, sanctuary of Isis located on an island
Discovery of the Aswan High Dam and panorama over Lake Nasser

activities.text: Felucca ride on the Nile around Elephantine and Kitchener islands

visits.text: Sleeper train journey from Aswan to Cairo
Walk through the Khan al-Khalili souk and visit to the Cairo museum

activities.text: Free dinner and evening in the historic center of Cairo
Free time for photos and discovery of the solar boat museum

visits.text: Exploration of the Giza plateau: pyramids of Khufu, Khafre, Menkaure and the Sphinx

activities.text: Meeting with local artisans and walk around Lake Qaroun

visits.text: Route to the Fayoum oasis and discovery of the village of Tunis known for its pottery

activities.text: Walk in the desert and observation of prehistoric cetacean fossils

visits.text: Exploration of the Valley of Whales (Wadi Al-Hitan), UNESCO-listed paleontological site

activities.text: Relaxation and walk in the oasis

visits.text: Discovery of the Qaroun desert and the ancient mills of Fayoum

activities.text: Last evening by the Nile before the return flight

visits.text: Return to Cairo and visit of the Coptic quarter and Saladin's citadel

activities.text: Last evening by the Nile before the return flight

seo.h1_title: Egypt Beyond the Pyramids: A Journey to Temples & Desert Oases
seo.intro_paragraph: Luxor, Edfu, Kom Ombo, Aswan, Cairo, Giza and Fayoum oasis. Egypt, a journey through millennia.
seo.seo_hook: Temples crown the hills, pyramids pierce the sky, oases shimmer green, fossils reveal ancient ages. Egypt is yesterday and today.

itineraries.title: Egypt's Western Desert: Hidden Oases and White Desert Limestone Formations

visits.text: Arrival in Cairo and transfer to the hotel

activities.text: Free discovery of Cairo's city center

visits.text: Visit of the pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx
Discovery of the Grand Egyptian Museum

activities.text: Walk around the Giza plateau to observe the pyramids at sunset

visits.text: Route to the Bahariya oasis through the western desert
Discovery of the natural hot springs and salt lake of Bahariya

activities.text: Ascent of the pyramid mountain to admire the sunset over the oasis

visits.text: Crossing of the Black Desert and observation of its basaltic mountains
Discovery of Crystal Mountain and Agabat
Exploration of the White Desert and its rock formations

activities.text: Picnic in the village of El Haiz

visits.text: Morning hike through the White Desert
Route to the Fayoum oasis passing by Lake Qarun

activities.text: Discovery of the agricultural villages and gardens of Fayoum

visits.text: Visit to the petrified forest and the temple of Qasr el Sagha
Exploration of the ancient site of Dimieh El Sebaa

activities.text: Walking tour through the village of Tunis

visits.text: Guided visit of Wadi al Hitan, UNESCO-listed paleontological site
Discovery of the dunes of Qasr el Arab

activities.text: Picnic in the heart of the valley of whales

seo.h1_title: Egypt's Western Desert: Hidden Oases and White Desert Limestone Formations
seo.intro_paragraph: Start from Cairo to discover the Western Desert oases: Bahariya, Farafra and the White Desert, Fayoum and its lakes. Another Egypt, far from the crowds.
seo.seo_hook: Oasis waters shimmer jade green, limestone towers glow ghostly, endless dunes whisper ancient silence. Egypt's oases are desert magic.
